entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -19.1°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 76 %

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
